```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data <- read_tsv("world-country-names.tsv")

data <- data %>% mutate(
  new_info = abs(id) + utf8ToInt(name)
)

write_tsv(data, "my_data.tsv")
read_tsv("my_data.tsv")
```
